import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ShoppingCartIcon, UserIcon, Bars3Icon, XMarkIcon, ChevronDownIcon, MapPinIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { useAuth } from '../../context/AuthContext'; import { useCart } from '../../context/CartContext'; import SearchBar from './SearchBar'; import NotificationCenter from './NotificationCenter'; const Header = () => { const { user, isAuthenticated, logout, isAdmin, isManager } = useAuth(); const { totalItems } = useCart(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [showMobileMenu, setShowMobileMenu] = useState(false); const [showLocationDropdown, setShowLocationDropdown] = useState(false); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/'); setShowMobileMenu(false); }; const toggleMenu = () => { setShowMobileMenu(!showMobileMenu); }; const categories = [ 'Electronics', 'TVs & Appliances', 'Men', 'Women', 'Baby & Kids', 'Home & Furniture', 'Sports, Books & More', 'Flights', 'Offer Zone' ]; return ( <> {/* Main Header */}
{/* Logo */}

{/* Location */}
{showLocationDropdown && (

Bangalore, Karnataka
560001
)}
{/* Search Bar */}
{/* Right Side Actions */}
{/* Login/User */} {isAuthenticated ? (
My Profile Orders Wishlist {(isAdmin() || isManager()) && ( Admin Panel )}
) : ( Login )} {/* More Dropdown */}
{/* Notifications */} {isAuthenticated && (
)} 24x7 Customer Care Advertise Download App
{/* Cart */} Cart {totalItems > 0 && ( {totalItems > 9 ? '9+' : totalItems} )}
{/* Mobile menu button */}
{/* Categories Bar */}
{categories.map((category, index) => ( {category} ))}
{/* Mobile Navigation Menu */} {showMobileMenu && (
{/* Mobile Search */}
{/* Mobile Categories */} {categories.map((category, index) => ( setShowMobileMenu(false)} > {category} ))} {/* Mobile User Actions */}
setShowMobileMenu(false)} > Cart {totalItems > 0 && ( {totalItems} )} {isAuthenticated ? ( <> setShowMobileMenu(false)} > My Profile setShowMobileMenu(false)} > Orders ) : ( setShowMobileMenu(false)} > Login )}
)}
); }; export default Header;
